General.Name: Nantong Square Cold Chain Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Square Technology Group Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of food refrigeration equipment and tank containers in China. The company's freezing equipment is used in the areas of aquatic products, rice noodles, fruits and vegetables, meat processing, prepared foods, fast food, baking, snack foods, ice cream, etc. It is also involved in export activities. Square Technology Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.
